rules_text:
[i]Humble Farmer[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {G}. If you do, create two Food tokens.
[i]Luna[/i] – Creatures blocking Brom, Rural Juggernaut get -0/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn. This effect can't reduce those creatures toughness to be less than 1.
